question: What links lipid metabolism pathways to ALS?
ideal_answer: Dysregulation of lipid metabolism is observed early in the spinal cord of the SOD1 ALS mouse model, and abnormal levels of cholesterol and other lipids are observed in the blood and CNS of ALS patients. In addition, higher blood high density lipoprotein and apolipoprotein A1 levels are associated with reduced risk of developing ALS.
